data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during BALEINE cruise from Mew Bay to Bombay started at 1762-05-01

Ship: Baleine (5th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Mew Bay -Java - Bombay, 1st Observer: Philip Affleck (Captain), 2nd Observer: Richard Douglas (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 32G 702BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
